channel.title: How to unmute someone if you have no command for it
channel.description:
this is for players that has no command for unmuteing someone
::mute ::unmute
OK go to your server folder and look for something like this >>>>moreinfo folder<<<< open it and find the account name that you what to muted click on it and go to where is says > character-mutedate =
if the account is mute it will say something like this >>>> character-mutedate = 284621
to unmute the account put the numbers to 0 like this >>>> character-mutedate = 0
then save it and you are done he or she will be unmute :D
>owner off foxscape-v2<
